PUBLISHER....: WILEY                     -  LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH

<--( BOOK )------------------------------------------------------------------->
This is a much awaited revision of a modern classic that covers all the major
topics in modern physics, including relativity, quantum physics, and their
applications. Krane provides a balanced presentation of both the historical
development of all major modern physics concepts and the experimental evidence
supporting the theory.
